scripts.start: pnpm run build && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.start:dev: pnpm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "pnpm run watch:ts" "pnpm exec fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js"
scripts.test: pnpm run build && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && c8 node --test -r ts-node/register "test/**/*.ts"
